password_min: The password has to be at least {arguments} chars long.
password_uppercase: The password has to contain at least one uppercase letter.
password_lowercase: The password has to contain at least one lowercase letter.
password_digits: The password has to contain at least one digit.
password_symbols: The password has to contain at least one symbol.
enterValidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
userNameAlreadyTaken: This email address is already in use by a user account.
unkownSignUpError: Unfortunately, no user account could be created.
unkownForgotPasswordError:
An error occurred while resetting the password. 
Please try again later or contact support.
resetPasswordSuccessful:
Your password has now been reset. 
You can log in again.
errorLimitedString: The text must contain a minimum of {min} and a maximum of {max} characters.
